title: Final hole drama cuts Scottie Scheffler's lead and sets up thrilling final day of the Masters
description: There was some final hole drama of the third round at the Masters, which sets up the prospect of a thrilling final day.

title: Tiger Woods rides rollercoaster third round at Masters as he struggles for consistency
description: Tiger Woods' incredible Masters journey continued on Saturday as he teed off for his third round at Augusta National.

title: Soaring food and fuel prices are tipping countries over the edge
description: When people took to the streets in Egypt in 2011, protesters chanted about freedom and social justice — but also bread. The cost of pantry staples had jumped because of the skyrocketing price of goods like wheat, stoking fury with President Hosni Mubarak.

title: Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck engaged
description: Bennifer 2.0 is planning to take it to the altar.

title: Volkswagen rejects shareholder push for climate lobbying disclosures
description: Volkswagen has rejected a shareholder proposal for it to explain how its lobbying activities align with its climate goals -- something two of the carmaker's leading competitors have already promised to do, one of the investors said on Friday.

title: The night sky is changing before our eyes
description: I hate to fail. I suspect this trait would make me a very bad NASA scientist, many of whom have been putting the Artemis I moon mission rocket through its final, prelaunch tests.

title: British diver rescued off the coast of Malaysia says his son died at sea
description: A Dutch teenager who disappeared after going diving off the coast of Malaysia is dead, according to his father who was found drifting at sea on Saturday, officials said.

title: Finland and Sweden could soon join NATO, prompted by Russian war in Ukraine
description: Finland and Sweden could soon join NATO, moves that would likely infuriate Moscow and that officials say would further underscore Russia's strategic error in invading Ukraine.

title: Analysis: Two GOP senators chose to disrespect Ketanji Brown Jackson. And it's a bad look
description: History was made on Thursday in the United States Senate.

title: Ukrainians shocked by 'crazy' scene at Chernobyl
description: The sudden ear-piercing beep of a radiation meter fills the room as a Ukrainian soldier walks in. This is where Russian soldiers were living at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, and radiation levels are now higher than normal.

title: Donald Trump Jr. texted ideas for overturning 2020 election before result was called
description: • 'Stop the Steal' leader cooperating with DOJ's investigation of Capitol riot

title: Child care is expensive everywhere. But this country tops the list
description: Having children is expensive, no matter where in the world you live. But, while America finds itself in the middle of the cost scale, China has become one of the priciest places to raise kids.

title: Why these Russians are fleeing to Georgia
description: As Russia continues to wage war, some Russians are fleeing to neighboring Georgia and expressing support for Ukraine, CNN's Matt Rivers reports.

title: 'The Simpsons' will feature a deaf actor and American Sign Language for the first time
description: "The Simpsons" will feature a deaf actor on Sunday for the first time in its 33-year history.

title: He won $217 million in the lottery, then spent nearly all of it to help save the planet
description: A lucky Frenchman has decided to dedicate most of his record-breaking $217 million lottery jackpot to a nature foundation he created, he told Le Parisien in an exclusive interview published Wednesday.

title: Joint US-Indonesia war games to expand to 14 nations
description: The Indonesian and United States militaries are expanding their annual bilateral exercises to 14 participating countries, the Indonesian Army said in a news release Thursday.

title: Tiger Woods makes cut at the Masters in extraordinary return following long injury layoff
description: Tiger Woods teed off for his second round at the Masters on Friday following an excellent return to competitive golf.

title: New satellite image of tunnel in North Korea has the US worried. Here's why
description: CNN's Barbara Starr reports that US State Department officials are "worried" North Korea may resume nuclear testing after new satellite images show a new tunnel being constructed at a remote testing site.

title: 'Kill them all': Shocking intercepted audio reveals conversation between Russian soldiers
description: Ukrainian officials say there is new audio from intercepted radio traffic revealing Russian soldiers killing and raping civilians. CNN's Matthew Chance reports.
